title: The configuration for a trigger mask
description: Defines a rectangle to mask out detected objects.

$schema.description: Reference to the schema for the JSON. Set this to the example value to get full Intellisense support in editors that support it.

xMinimum.description: The x coordinate of the top right of the mask rectangle.

yMinimum.description: The y coordinate of the top right of the mask rectangle.

xMaximum.description: The x coordinate of the bottom left of the mask rectangle.

yMaximum.description: The y coordinate of the top right of the mask rectangle.
